comment._content: This is Government House, Wellington.  Ian Hay-Campbell

comment.author: 93183605@N07
comment._content: This and the following series (including interiors) all seem to be taken at Government House, Wellington. There is a contemporary gallery of images here: gg.govt.nz/resources/media/image-gallery/134 - some of the rooms have been renamed.
